name: Yamper
description: This Pokémon is very popular as a herding dog in the Galar region. As it runs, it generates electricity from the base of its tail.

abilities.name: Ball Fetch
abilities.description: If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
abilities.description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
